Bounty Hunter Kintaijin:
Didn't you leave yet?
Didn't I already tell you that I would trust your skill when you hunt down Stakatos such as Spiked Stakato series, Cannibalistic Stakato series in Stakato Nest and bring back 500 Dirty Beads as an avidence?
The mission shouldn't be too tough. The problem is that the hunting will be overwhelming for yourself alone. Make sure to go with your fellows.
